title: How long does it take for Riot support to answer a ticket
body: how long this gona take from support to answer my ticket i just want my old your shop back i bought RP just for a skins in that old shop then i wake up to found that they reset the shop and all that skins that i need was gone please help me{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body: I checked up on that ticket and it looks like it was just updated about 30 min! That agent should be able to respond and get that taken care of pretty shortly!
